LanguageData.NGET_CorpseTypeRottingEnabledTooltip: Is the corpse type enabled for processing inside the extractor type?
LanguageData.NGET_CorpseTypeDesiccatedEnabledTooltip: Is the corpse type enabled for processing inside the extractor type?
LanguageData.NGET_WorkHoursTooltip: The amount of in-game hours it should take to extract one genepack from a fresh corpse
LanguageData.NGET_WorkHoursMultiplierTooltip: The multiplier for length of time that it should take to extract one genepack from this type of corpse
LanguageData.NGET_WorkHoursEfficiencyMultiplierToolti: The multiplier applied to the total work time to reduce (or extend) the total work time
LanguageData.NGET_WorkHoursMultiplierOverdriveTooltip: The multiplier for how much work is performed per tick while running this extractor in overdrive
LanguageData.NGET_CostNeutroamineTooltip: The amount of neutroamine it should cost per hour to extract one genepack from a fresh corpse
LanguageData.NGET_CostNeutroamineMultiplierTooltip: The multiplier for amount of neutroamine that it should take to extract one genepack from this type of corpse
LanguageData.NGET_CostNeutroamineEfficiencyMultiplier: The multiplier applied to the neutroamine consumption per hour to enhance or degrade the total neutroamine consumption efficiency
LanguageData.NGET_CostNeutroaminMultiplierOverdriveTo: The multiplier for how much neutroamine is consumed per hour while running this extractor in overdrive
LanguageData.NGET_InsertCorpseTooltip: Insert a corpse into the gene extractor. Its genetic material will be extracted and used to create a genepack containing a random selection of their genes.
